price: 71. « Nous adorons des idoles, répondirent-ils, et nous leur vouons un culte exclusif. »
arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū naʿbudu aṣnāman fanaẓallu lahā ʿākifīna
